entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Norfolk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Delhi 11:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: -1.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 61 %
Wind Chill: -2
Dewpoint: -8.0°C
Wind: W 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow before morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snow or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain beginning in the afternoon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High plus 3. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
